course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Extended Reality: Systems, Principles, and Design
course.description: This course aims to explore the theories, technologies, and design principles of Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR). The course aims to develop a deep understanding of AR/VR systems and empower students to contribute to the advancement of immersive technologies. The students will acquire the knowledge through lectures, and practical hands-on labs, and will consolidate their knowledge through a final project.
